longDef.en: something very good and difficult that you have succeeded in doing

examples.en: It gives you a sense of achievement if you actually make it to the end of a very long book.
examples.cn: 如果你能真正读完一本厚书，就会有一种成就感。

examples.en: An Olympic silver medal is a remarkable achievement for one so young.
examples.cn: 对于如此年轻的选手而言，夺得奥运会银牌是个了不起的成就。

examples.en: The Tale of Genji has been described as the greatest achievement of Japanese literature.
examples.cn: 《源氏物语》一直被称作是日本文学最伟大的成就。
